bill.title: Nonpartisan County Elections Act; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The "nonpartisan County Elections Act"; To Provide That A County Office Shall Be Nonpartisan; To Provide Definitions For Such Act; To Provide When A Person Shall File Their Intent To Be A Candidate; To Provide The Amount Of Filing Fees Applicable For County Offices; To Provide How The Names Of The Candidates Shall Be Grouped On A Ballot; To Provide The Procedure When Two Or More Candidates Qualify For One County Office; To Amend Section 23-15-297, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Remove County Offices From Fee Requirements For Party Nomination; To Amend Section 23-15-299, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Preceding Act; To Amend Sections 23-15-291, 23-15-153, 23-15-367, 23-15-411, 23-15-713 And 23-15-801, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Preceding Act; To Bring Forward Section 23-15-911, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides The Procedure For Canvassing Ballot Boxes, For Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To County Affairs;Apportionment and Elections
